Material Checklist
■Stock Levels
■On-Going Promotions
■Promotional Products
■Happy Meal Toys
■Well-Stocked Coin Changer

Washed Your Hands?
■Use McDonald's
hand soap. Wash
properly. Dry with
a paper towel.

Within 90s
■From first greeting the
customer to handing over the
finished order, it should
take less than 90s.

Within 60s
■From telling the customer
the price to handing them
the order, it should take
less than 60s.

Within 3m 30s
■From the time the customer
enters the line until they
get their finished order,
it should take less than
3m 30s.
